responses.text: What can you tell me about the Xenoids?

dynamic_line: I've seen a few ranger types when doing patrols around the forests.  I've been incredibly lucky so far, last time I almost couldn't stop the bleeding after they fired those darts at me.
Those blue crystals freak me out.  Have you noticed how the heal right before your eyes.  Best bet is to kill and pulp them as quickly as possible.
